A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
all the battle sequences were good.... thats about it.
there are zero payoffs to anything set up beforehand. the movie excells at squandering all its chances to gratify. a completely pointless side story ends up adding more time than you want to spend on this film. the climax of this film is anticlimactic to say the least and happens 40 mintutes before the end. the story was sloppy and new characters fail to carry the same magic they had from the last film.

all that i can forgive in the name of star wars HOWEVER\, what i absolutely CANNOT forgive is the utterly disrespectful whitewash of the old characters. 


i want to say as a lifelong fan\, ive been dedicated loyal tolerant and above all forgivable to star wars many times over. that time has past bc of this movie

the mary poppins cameo was awful. a literal joke and a mockery of all that is sacred in the lore. a slap in the face to all entries prior...
